item.name: Abyssal Specter
item.text: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

item.name: Advance Scout
item.text: First strike {W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet—all in one direction, none returning." —Oracle en-Vec

item.name: Air Elemental
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

item.name: Angelic Page
item.text: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

item.name: Arc Lightning
item.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.
item.flavorText: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

item.name: Argothian Elder
item.text: {T}: Untap two target lands.
item.flavorText: Sharpen your ears —Elvish expression meaning "grow wiser"

item.name: Armored Pegasus
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits." —Tahlil en-Dal, bounty hunter

item.name: Azure Drake
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Little dreamt could seem so cruel As waiting for the wings outspread, The jagged teeth, the burning eyes, And dagger-claws that clench to nerves.

item.name: Blinking Spirit
item.text: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Don't look at it Maybe it'll go away" —Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

item.name: Broken Fall
item.text: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.
item.flavorText: "I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

item.name: Cackling Fiend
item.text: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
item.flavorText: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

item.name: Catastrophe
item.text: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

item.name: Cinder Marsh
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

item.name: Control Magic
item.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

item.name: Counterspell
item.text: Counter target spell.

item.name: Crazed Skirge
item.text: Flying, haste
item.flavorText: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.

item.name: Curfew
item.text: Each player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: ". . . But I'm not tired"

item.name: Dark Ritual
item.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

item.name: Dirtcowl Wurm
item.text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.
item.flavorText: Few of Rath's rivers follow a steady course, so many new channels are carved for them.

item.name: Disenchant
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: "I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

item.name: Disruptive Student
item.text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
item.flavorText: "Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time." —Barrin, progress report

item.name: Drifting Meadow
item.text: Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Elvish Lyrist
item.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

item.name: Exhume
item.text: Each player puts a creature card from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.
item.flavorText: "Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change." —Sitrik, birth priest

item.name: Fecundity
item.text: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, that creature's controller may draw a card.
item.flavorText: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

item.name: Fertile Ground
item.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
item.flavorText: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.

item.name: Fire Ants
item.text: {T}: Fire Ants deals 1 damage to each other creature without flying.
item.flavorText: Visitors to Shiv fear the dragons, the goblins, or the viashino. Natives fear the ants.

item.name: Flood
item.text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
item.flavorText: "A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield." —Vibekke Ragnild, Witches and War

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Giant Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

item.name: Gorilla Warrior
item.flavorText: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

item.name: Healing Salve
item.text: Choose one — Target player gains 3 life; or prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

item.name: Heat Ray
item.text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: It's not known whether the Thran built the device to forge their wonders or to defend them.

item.name: Hurricane
item.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

item.name: Infantry Veteran
item.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war." —Telim'Tor

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Land Tax
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

item.name: Lhurgoyf
item.text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
item.flavorText: "Ach Hans, run It's the lhurgoyf" —Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

item.name: Lightning Elemental
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.

item.name: Living Death
item.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

item.name: Llanowar Elves
item.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. —Llanowar penalty for trespassing

item.name: Mana Leak
item.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
item.flavorText: "The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy." —Volrath

item.name: Maniacal Rage
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
item.flavorText: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

item.name: Man-o'-War
item.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." —Naimah, Femeref philosopher

item.name: Manta Riders
item.text: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Water is firmament to the finned." —Oracle en-Vec

item.name: Master Decoy
item.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
item.flavorText: "A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

item.name: Mogg Hollows
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Nekrataal
item.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My Betrayal is certain—but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say." —Jolrael

item.name: Opportunity
item.text: Target player draws four cards.
item.flavorText: "He cocooned himself alone in his workshop for months. When he finally emerged, all broad grins and excited chatter, I knew he'd found his answer." —Barrin, master wizard

item.name: Pacifism
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
item.flavorText: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

item.name: Pestilence
item.text: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence. {B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

item.name: Phyrexian Ghoul
item.text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

item.name: Pincher Beetles
item.text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
item.flavorText: "No fair Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?" —Squee, goblin cabin hand

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.text: W

item.name: Plated Rootwalla
item.text: {2}{G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
item.flavorText: " . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ." —Skyshroud children's story

item.name: Polluted Mire
item.text: Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
item.text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

item.name: Raging Goblin
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

item.name: Ray of Command
item.text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.
item.flavorText: "Heel."

item.name: Reanimate
item.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "You will learn to earn death." —Volrath

item.name: Remote Isle
item.text: Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: River Boa
item.text: Islandwalk {G}: Regenerate River Boa.
item.flavorText: "But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war." —Afari, Tales

item.name: Rolling Thunder
item.text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
item.flavorText: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

item.name: Sadistic Glee
item.text: Enchant creature Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
item.flavorText: "First blood isn't as important as last blood." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

item.name: Sanctum Custodian
item.text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
item.flavorText: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.

item.name: Sanctum Guardian
item.text: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.
item.flavorText: "Protect our mother in her womb."

item.name: Sandstorm
item.text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
item.flavorText: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

item.name: Scaled Wurm
item.flavorText: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

item.name: Scryb Sprites
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

item.name: Seasoned Marshal
item.text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
item.flavorText: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

item.name: Seeker of Skybreak
item.text: {T}: Untap target creature.
item.flavorText: "We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

item.name: Sengir Vampire
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

item.name: Sewer Rats
item.text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.
item.flavorText: You lie down with rats, and the rats run away. —Suq'Ata insult

item.name: Shower of Sparks
item.text: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

item.name: Skyshroud Elite
item.text: Skyshroud Elite gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a nonbasic land.
item.flavorText: "Civilization is a conspiracy to disguise the mutilation of nature." —Skyshroud elite creed

item.name: Slippery Karst
item.text: Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.name: Soltari Foot Soldier
item.text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
item.flavorText: "Children of the Ruins, raised to be warriors, know that life begins when another speaks their names." —Soltari Tales of Life

item.name: Songstitcher
item.text: {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.
item.flavorText: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.

item.name: Soul Warden
item.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost. —Vec teaching

item.name: Spike Colony
item.text: Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.name: Spike Feeder
item.text: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

item.name: Spike Weaver
item.text: Spike Weaver enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

item.name: Spike Worker
item.text: Spike Worker enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.name: Steam Blast
item.text: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: The viashino knew of the cracked pipes but deliberately left them unmended to bolster the rig's defenses.

item.name: Subversion
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
item.flavorText: Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.

item.name: Sun Clasp
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "And darkness shall be cast from me For my soul resides in the Sun." —Femeref dirge

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swords to Plowshares
item.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.name: Symbiosis
item.text: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

item.name: Syphon Soul
item.text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

item.name: Terror
item.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.name: Thalakos Lowlands
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Thalakos Lowlands doesn't untap during your next untap step.

item.name: Tranquility
item.text: Destroy all enchantments.

item.name: Trumpeting Armodon
item.text: {1}{G}: Target creature blocks Trumpeting Armodon this turn if able.
item.flavorText: These are its last days. But it will not go quietly.

item.name: Unnerve
item.text: Each opponent discards two cards.
item.flavorText: "If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me." —Xantcha, to Gix

item.name: Uthden Troll
item.text: {R}: Regenerate Uthden Troll.
item.flavorText: "Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere, Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near, Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh 'n da hurt'll disappear." —Troll chant

item.name: Vec Townships
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Vec Townships doesn't untap during your next untap step.

item.name: Village Elder
item.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.

item.name: Wall of Heat
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
item.flavorText: At a distance, we mistook the sound for a waterfall . . . .

item.name: Weakness
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-1.

item.name: Wildfire Emissary
item.text: Protection from white {1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire." —Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat

item.name: Wind Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings." —William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

item.name: Windfall
item.text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
item.flavorText: "To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it." —Barrin, master wizard

item.name: Wrath of God
item.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
